_header: Benedicite what dreamed I this night

Title(s): ‘Thi lady hath forgeten to be kynd’
_description: ‘Thi lady hath forgeten to be kynd’ — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd5465.First Lines: Benedicite whate dremyd I this nyȝt…
